sentences.english: Did you feel a sense of shame around your circumstances?
sentences.chinese: 在您周围的境况中您是否感觉到了羞耻感呢？

sentences.english: Villagers built Ruiyuan themselves to improve their children's opportunities.
sentences.chinese: 村民们修建了瑞元小学，以期改善子女的教育境况。

sentences.english: No one can be sure what he would do in such circumstances.
sentences.chinese: 在这样的境况下，没有谁知道他将做什么。

sentences.english: Such is Golding's sense of human condition.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些都是戈尔丁对人类境况的悲剧性意识。

sentences.english: Bishamber had now come back to Calcutta, and had at once made enquiries about his sister.
sentences.chinese: 比山博现在来了加尔各答，当即询问关于妹妹的境况。

sentences.english: People who are highly playful are better equipped to cope with life situations.
sentences.chinese: 玩心重的人能更好地应对生活的各种境况。

sentences.english: Right now the poor guy is really down and out .
sentences.chinese: 现在，可怜的旦尼尔真是处于穷困潦到的境况。

sentences.english: I’m thinking of what Herbert Hoover faced during the Great Depression.
sentences.chinese: 我想到了赫伯特胡佛在大萧条中所面对的境况。

sentences.english: The circumstance will only change when you start to decide on the solution.
sentences.chinese: 你的境况只有在你决定解决问题的时候才能有所改变。

sentences.english: Relationship itself always already exists as your living condition.
sentences.chinese: 师徒关系本身一直是你当下的境况。

sentences.english: Live the challenge out and see where it takes you.
sentences.chinese: 挺过各种挑战看它能把你带到何种境况。

sentences.english: And what about Manchester United’s La Liga double Barcelona?
sentences.chinese: 而与曼联同病相怜的，西甲的巴塞罗那境况又如何呢？

sentences.english: You're always harking back to how things were50 years ago.
sentences.chinese: 你老是喜欢重提五十年前的境况。

sentences.english: When you build it into yourself, no external circumstances can take it away.
sentences.chinese: 当你树其于心时，任何外在的境况不会带走它。

sentences.english: How did we get ourselves into this mess?
sentences.chinese: 我们是怎么把自己卷进这些糟糕境况的？

sentences.english: Shares don't get better as they go higher. They get worse.
sentences.chinese: 就算股价走高境况也不会变得更妙，而是更糟。

definition: luck/fate/opportunity/the ups and downs of life
internal trouble and outside aggression (idiom); in a mess both domestically and abroad
